'''Per Arne Engstad''' is a Norwegian game designer. He translated the Text-Adventure ''[[Ringen]]'' into English and converted it into MUD-software (''[[VikingMUD]]''<ref>VikingMUD at [http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/viking.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 4 August 2011)</ref> and ''[[Genesis]]'').<ref>Genesis at [http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/genesis.html Tolkien Games] (Retrieved 4 August 2011)</ref>
